Uses of Class
customExceptions.NotAvailableException

  • Packages that use NotAvailableException 
    Package Description
    dbDAO  
    facade  

    • Uses of NotAvailableException in dbDAO

      Methods in dbDAO that throw NotAvailableException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Company CompanyDBDAO.getCompanyById(long id)
      This method is returning a company instance from the DB according to the id that received in the method signature.
      Company CompanyDAO.getCompanyById(long id)
      this is an AbstractMethod that bound to extract company from DB by adjusting the receiving id in the signature to the id column in DB.
      Coupon CouponDBDAO.getCouponeById(long id)
      this method is returning a coupon instance back from DB by adjustment the received id in the signature of the method to the coupons id column in the DB using CoupListclass
      Coupon CouponDAO.getCouponeById(long id)
      this anAbstractMethod that bound to received coupon by transmitting a long id.
      Customer CustomerDBDAO.getCustomerById(long id)
      This method is returning a customer instance from the DB according to the id that received in the method signature.
      Customer CustomerDAO.getCustomerById(long id)
      this is an AbstractMethod that bound to extract customer from DB by adjusting the receiving id in the signature to the id column in DB.
      void CompanyDBDAO.removeCompany(Company company)
      This method removing all the company records including coupons that exist even in a customer ownership.
      void CompanyDAO.removeCompany(Company company)
      this an AbstractMethod that bound to remove company .
      void CouponDBDAO.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      removeCoupon method is designed to remove coupon either by company or by the DailyCouponExpirationTask from all the tables in DB Coupon ,Company_Coupon and Customer_Coupon.
      void CouponDAO.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      this an AbstractMethod that bound to remove coupon .
      void CustomerDBDAO.removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      This method removing all the customer records including coupons that in the customer ownership.
      void CustomerDAO.removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      this an AbstractMethod that bound to remove customer .

      Methods in facade that throw NotAvailableException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Company AdminFacade.getCompanyById(long id)
      this method gives instruction for CompanyDBDAOclass to extract a company from DB by receiving long id and conductor it to the getCompanyById method in CompanyDBDAOclass

      Customer AdminFacade.getCustomer(long id)
      this method gives instruction for CustomerDBDAOclass to extract a customer from DB by receiving long id and conductor it to the getCustomer method in CustomerDBDAOclass
      void AdminFacade.removeCompany(Company company)
      this method gives instruction for CompanyDBDAOclass to remove a company from the DB.it receiving a company instance and conductor it to the removeCompany method in CompanyDBDAO class
      void CompanyFacade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      this method gives instruction for CouponDBDAOclass to remove a coupon from the DB.it receiving a coupon instance and conductor it to the removeCoupon method in CouponDBDAO class
      void AdminFacade.removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      this method gives instruction for CustomerDBDAOclass to remove a customer from the DB.it receiving a customer instance and conductor it to the removeCustomer method in CustomerDBDAO class
